alert.note: Alert for La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 22 at 5:12PM MST until September 22 at 10:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of west central Arizona, including the following county, La Paz. * WHEN...Until 815 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Running washes will create a road hazard for some unbridged crossings. Some low lying spots will have ponding of water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 512 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... French Creek, Smith Wash, Tyson Wash, Ehrenberg Wash, Plomosa Wash and La Cholla Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Quartzsite, La Paz Valley, Highway 95. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
